metadata.title: CVE-2020-27782 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Undertow AJP connector. Malicious requests andabrupt connection closes could be triggered by an attacker using querystrings with non-RFC compliant characters resulting in a denial of service.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability. Thisaffects Undertow 2.1.5.SP1, 2.0.33.SP2, and 2.2.3.SP1.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
